About

I'm Alex, a graphic and web designer from Montreal with 3+ years of full-time experience designing for multiple brands in different industries. My design philosophy combines simplicity with polish and style.

Currently a designer at Foodtastic.

Also available for freelance work.

Skill Set

Multidisciplinary designer with a range of experience and skills for print, digital and motion graphics.
Front-end web development capabilities to boot.

My Story

As a teenager I became interested in graphic design, animation and coding. Since the start I have been into art and technology which attracted me to this field. I studied graphic and web design at John Abbott College (graduating on the dean’s list) meanwhile taking on my first freelance projects. After graduation I began working full time as an in-house graphic designer at restaurant franchising company Foodtastic where I have had the opportunity to work with many brands on different marketing campaigns and projects. Using design solutions for packaging, print and digital formats I create compelling experiences with the goal of telling s tory, increasing brand recognition and boosting sales.

I now have over 5 years of experience working and studying in the graphic and web design field and am commited to expanding my skillset and growing my business.
